member.name: M:UserNotification.View.NotificationWindow.OnClosing(System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs)
member.summary:
Overrides closing window behaviour to avoid that a user can close a notification via ALT+F4 or Esc key. Overiding this is required since a window that is closed cannot be shown via Show again - one would have to re-create the entire window with new - which is not part of the current concept.
Current concept is: use Show/hide durring livetime of hosting window and close when hosting window is closed.
